explains: adj. 令人钦佩的，极其出色的

sentences.en: Loyalty was her most admirable quality.
sentences.cn: 忠诚是她最令人钦佩的品质。

sentences.en: The goals identified in the report are generally admirable.
sentences.cn: 报告中确定的目标总体上是值得赞扬的。

sentences.en: Twain was an admirable figure comparable to Abraham Lincoln.
sentences.cn: 吐温是个令人钦佩的人物，可以与亚伯拉罕·林肯相提并论。
